title: Smeagol, Hurried Guide (7C72)
text:
Set:	The Return of the King
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Companion
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Frodo
Game Text:	Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: If you have initiative, discard 2 cards from your hand. Smeagol cannot be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.
Rarity:	C
